Sentencas: This study investigates the feasibility of electricity production in a solid oxide fuel cell using methane recovered from groundwater as the fuel.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell fuelled by methane recovered from groundwater

Sentencas: Methane must be removed from groundwater for the production of drinking water to, amongst others, avoid bacterial regrowth.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell fuelled by methane recovered from groundwater

Sentencas: Instead of releasing methane to the atmosphere or converting it to carbon dioxide by flaring, methane can also be recovered by vacuum stripping and served as a fuel.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell fuelled by methane recovered from groundwater

Sentencas: However, the electrical efficiency of currently used combustion-based technologies fuelled with methane-rich gas is limited to 35% due to the low heating value of the recovered gas (70 mol.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell fuelled by methane recovered from groundwater

Sentencas: % methane) and power derating due to the presence of carbon dioxide (25 mol.%).
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell fuelled by methane recovered from groundwater

Sentencas: We propose to use a solid oxide fuel cell to use the methane-rich gas as fuel.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell fuelled by methane recovered from groundwater

Sentencas: Solid Oxide Fuel Cells are fuel-flexible and potentially attain higher electrical efficiencies up to 60%.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell fuelled by methane recovered from groundwater

Sentencas: To this end, specific gas processing, including cleaning and methane reforming, is required to allow for durable operation in a solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell fuelled by methane recovered from groundwater

Sentencas: We assessed whether electricity could be generated by a solid oxide fuel cell using methane recovered from a full-scale drinking water treatment plant as a fuel.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell fuelled by methane recovered from groundwater

Sentencas: The groundwater had a methane concentration of 45 mg center dot L-1, and the recovered gas by vacuum towers contained 70 mol% methane.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell fuelled by methane recovered from groundwater

Sentencas: We used a gas cleaning reactor with impregnated activated carbon to remove hydrogen sulfide traces from the methane-rich gas.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell fuelled by methane recovered from groundwater

Sentencas: Thermodynamic calculations showed that additional steam is required to achieve a high methane reforming.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell fuelled by methane recovered from groundwater

Sentencas: The added steam and the carbon dioxide content in the recovered gas simultaneously contribute to the methane reforming to prevent carbon deposition.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell fuelled by methane recovered from groundwater

Sentencas: The measured open circuit potential corresponded with the theoretical Nernst voltage, implying high methane reforming in the solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell fuelled by methane recovered from groundwater

Sentencas: The achieved power density of the cell fuelled with the methanerich gas (mixed with steam) was 27% less than the hydrogen-fuelled cell.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell fuelled by methane recovered from groundwater

Sentencas: Ultimately, 51.2% of the power demand of the plant can be covered by replacing the gas engine in a drinking water treatment with a 915 kW solid oxide fuel cell system fuelled by the methane recovered from the groundwater, while the greenhouse gas emission can be reduced by 17.6%.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell fuelled by methane recovered from groundwater
